description.message: A quick access tool that allows you to put your favorite browser commands in one drop down menu, save unsubmitted form data, magnify images, view videos in standalone windows, and define shortcuts to open all links in any bookmark folder.

item_image_bar.message: Enable image floating toolbar (magnifier, view original image, set wallpaper)

item_video_bar.message: Enable video floating toolbar (view video in stand-alone window)

item_close_last_tab.message: Do not close current browser window when closing last tab, create a new tab instead.

item_open_in_new_tab.message: Always open links in a new tab.

item_double_click_close_tab.message: Double click to close current tab.

tip_failed.message: You have selected 10 shortcuts. Please unselect some shortcuts and try again.

tip_failed3.message: This shortcut is used by another action.

bookmark_tip.message: Use the following shortcuts to open all links in a specified folder from the Bookmark Manager at once. Each link will open in its own tab.

bookmark_tip3.message: Click on the Folder icon to select a folder

new_incognito_window.message: Opens a new window in incognito mode

open_file.message: Opens a file from your computer in Google Chrome

reopen_closed_tab.message: Reopens the last tab you've closed

switch_tab.message: Switches to the tab at the specified position number on the tab strip

close_tab.message: Closes the current tab or pop-up

history_back.message: Goes to the previous page in your browsing history for the tab

history_forward.message: Goes to the next page in your browsing history for the tab

history_home.message: Opens your homepage in your current window

bookmarks_bar_always_show.message: Toggles the bookmarks bar on and off

browser_toolbar.message: Sets the focus on the browser toolbar. Use right and left arrows on the keyboard to navigate to different buttons on the toolbar. Press Shift+F10 to bring up any associated context menu (e.g. browsing history for the Back button). Press Esc to move the focus back to the page

context_menu.message: Bring up any associated context menu

clear_browsing_data.message: Opens the Clear Browsing Data dialog

help.message: Opens the Help Center in a new tab

edit_search_web.message: Places a '?' in the address bar. Type a search term after the question mark to perform a search using your default search engine

stop_menu.message: Stops the loading of your current page

edit_find_next.message: Finds the next match for your input in the find bar

edit_find_previous.message: Finds the previous match for your input in the find bar.

reload_ignoring_cache_menu.message: Reloads your current page, ignoring cached content

view_source.message: Opens the source of your current page

bookmark_current_page.message: Saves current webpage as a bookmark

bookmark_all_tabs.message: Saves all open pages as bookmarks in a new folder

text_smaller.message: Makes everything on the page smaller

text_default.message: Returns everything on the page to normal size

goto_top.message: Goes to the top of the page

goto_bottom.message: Goes to the bottom of the page

copy.message: Copies highlighted content to the clipboard

paste_match_style.message: Pastes content from the clipboard without formatting

cut.message: Deletes the highlighted content and copies it to the clipboard
